title: Twitter reacts to Cub Swanson's win over Kron Gracie to snap skid at UFC on ESPN+ 19
text:
Gallery Cub Swanson def. Kron Gracie at UFC on ESPN+ 19: Best photos view 41 images

Cub Swanson finally returned to the win column on Saturday when he defeated Kron Gracie in the UFC on ESPN+ 19 co-headliner.

Swanson (26-11 MMA, 11-7 UFC) snapped his four-fight skid in the featherweight division when he scored a unanimous decision victory over the previously unbeaten Gracie (5-1 MMA, 1-1 UFC) in the co-main event matchup, which took place at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla., and streamed on ESPN+.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions Swanson’s victory over Gracie at UFC on ESPN+ 19.

* * * *

We’re ready for the co-main event at #UFCTampa. Who are you picking in the featherweight fight between Kron Gracie and @CubSwanson? https://t.co/H5NuiGXmV5 pic.twitter.com/VAnY7rnF5Z — MMA Junkie (@MMAjunkie) October 13, 2019

Kron Gracie consistently doing that little front foot forward stomp thing a la Royce is one of my favorite things. #UFCTampa — Shaheen Al-Shatti (@shaunalshatti) October 13, 2019

I gotta go with my man with the full head of hair. #ufc — Justin Buchholz (@JustinBuchholz) October 13, 2019

Cub is getting very comfortable — caposa (@Grabaka_Hitman) October 13, 2019

Calf kicks and body shots adding up as well — Brandon Gibson (@SixGunGibson) October 13, 2019

Great first round for cub — ike vallie-flagg (@IKEVF) October 13, 2019

It’s target practice for Cub #UFCTampa — Mike Jackson, Esq. (@TheTruthJackson) October 13, 2019

I wondered how cub can be an underdog with all his high level experience — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 13, 2019

Cub out there hitting Gracie with the whole combo platter. I’m talking jalapeño poppers, hot wings, queso dip. Even the popcorn shrimp. — Ben Fowlkes (@benfowlkesMMA) October 13, 2019

this looks like it gonna be a bad night for undefeated BJJ specialists #ufctampa — E. Casey Leydon (@ekc) October 13, 2019

Kron gives zero fucks about getting punched in the face #UFCTampa — Mike Jackson, Esq. (@TheTruthJackson) October 13, 2019

Swanson absolutely destroying the body of Gracie. #UFCTampa — Rob Tatum (@RobTatum303) October 13, 2019

I have never seen an entire night of fights that had so many horrendous game plans put into effect. What is going on?!? — Sean McCorkle (@BigSexyMcCorkle) October 13, 2019

Fuck, kron is super tough!!! Round 2 for cub. — ike vallie-flagg (@IKEVF) October 13, 2019

Swanson vs Kron fight of the night!#UFCTampa — John Wayne Makdessi (@JohnMakdessi) October 13, 2019

Please move your head — Julie Kedzie (@julesk_fighter) October 13, 2019

Do you guys think Kron has ever drilled a takedown? Someone should tell him this isn’t 1997 — Ben Askren (@Benaskren) October 13, 2019

Fantastic fight, but a pretty clear 30-27 Swanson in my eyes. — Aaron Bronsteter (@aaronbronsteter) October 13, 2019

Wow! What a fight cub vs Kron! #ufctampa — Brad Tavares (@BradTavares) October 13, 2019

http://twitter.com/DaveCamarillo/status/1183207821086613504

I have cub winning that fight. But incredible game plan and great effort by kron #ufc — Jessica Eye (@jessicaevileye) October 13, 2019

Cub looked good tonight . Too seasoned for Kron, I didn’t see him losing this fight despite the vegas odds ! Kron is super tough #UFCTampa — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) October 13, 2019
description: See the top Twitter reactions to Cub Swanson's win over Kron Gracie at UFC on ESPN+ 19.
